text: The western Indian state of Gujarat has 33 districts after several splits of the original 17 districts at the formation of the state in 1960. Kutch is the largest district of Gujarat while Dang is the smallest. Ahmedabad district has the highest population while Dang has the lowest. Surat is the most densely populated district while Kutch is the least. There are 253 Talukas (subdivisions of districts) in Gujarat. == List of districts by division == The list of districts, organized by divisions: * Kutch **Kutch * Central Gujarat ** Ahmedabad ** Anand
